author: gnodet
msg: SMX4NMR-10: Stopping a component should stop SAs with SUs deployed onto it

author: hindessm
msg: Hack to make sure ecj.jar is available during the debian package build.
That is, set the ant library path at /usr/share/java rather than
/usr/share/ant/lib since the former appears to contain the ant jars and
other jars installed by debian packages.

author: hindessm
msg: Preserve permissions of debian/rules file when creating source bundles.

author: bpontarelli
msg: Moved the dynamic attributes up so that that they are available to type converters in the context
